events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the Software Engineer position and initial details look promising.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's experience in software development.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's hiring process.
Conducted the initial screening call where the candidate showed strong knowledge of software development principles.
The candidate responded positively and expressed enthusiasm about proceeding to the technical interview stage.
Scheduled the technical interview for May 5th to evaluate the candidate's coding and problem-solving skills.
